name: PLUNDER (itch) (SandwichBlam)
description:
Unimaginable horror and wealth for those who are brave enough to go in... GAMEPAD AND COMPUTER controls

System Requirements
  • 8 color, 256x256 resolution display
  • 32 megabytes of RAM
  • 16 megabytes of available hard drive space
  • Support for 8-bit audio playback *beep beep*
